headline: Bringing AI to the edge with NVIDIA GPUs
keywords: Developer Week, Developers, Cloudflare Workers, Partners, Cloudflare Network
description: To help anyone build AI-based applications Cloudflare is extending the Workers platform to include support for NVIDIA GPUs and TensorFlow. Soon youâ€™ll be able to build AI-based applications that run across the Cloudflare network using pre-built or custom models for inference.
